text:
I think the correct way is rendering the form in a form module
```{% form "form" 
    form_key='{{ name }}',
    form_to_use='{{ module.form_field.form_id }}',
    title='{{ module.form_field.title }}',
    follow_up_type_simple='{{ module.form_field.follow_up_type_simple }}',
    simple_email_for_live_id='{{ module.form_field.simple_email_for_live_id }}',
    response_response_type='{{ module.form_field.response_type }}',
    response_redirect_id='{{ module.form_field.redirect_id }}',
    response_redirect_url='{{ module.form_field.redirect_url }}',
    response_message='{{ module.form_field.message }}'
%}```
Yeah, that is the route I will go. Thank you.
Thanks <@U01BPRUKCUB>, this works :smile: I was under the impression that I should use the 'value' option
